mapper.insert: insert into book(name, author, picPath, `desc`, source) value (#{book.name}, #{book.author}, #{book.picPath}, #{book.desc}, #{book.source})
mapper.update: update book set name = #{book.name}, author = #{book.author}, picPath = #{book.picPath}, `desc` = #{book.desc}, source = #{book.source} where id = #{book.id}
mapper.select: select * from book where id = #{id} limit 1
